import { Navbar, Container, Button, Nav, Modal, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import { React, useEffect, useState } from "react"; function Header({details}) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <> Music Store Dapp
Home About
Address: {details.accounts} Account Address: {details.accounts} Balance:
{details.balance} ETH ChainID:
{details.chainId} ); } export default Header;
